document_data.Plot:
{{Quote |If you ask the Night Brigade, they say they bring stability to the prison. Keep things in line. Prevent the place from tearing itself apart.
If you ask me, they're a bunch of brutes who have filled their pockets by crushing everyone weaker than them and then looting the corpses. |[[Old Tarlow]] }} '''Rats in a Cage''' '''The Wizard's Labyrinth''' '''The Knife's Edge''' '''The Darkness and the Light'''
